colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022B (BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKADD CES BKA' STZAL PA DANG, 'PHAGS PA BYAMS PA 'JAM DPAL DANG, ,'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS DBANG PHYUG SOGS PA BSKAL PA BZANG PO'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' THAMS CAD DANG, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RDO RJE SNYING PO LA SOGS PA PHYOGS BCU'I 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS NAS 'DUS PA DE DAG THAMS CAD DANG, LHA DANG KLU DANG GNOD SBYIN DANG, ,SRIN PO DANG DRI ZA DANG LHA MA YIN DANG, ,NAM MKHA'I LDING DANG, MI ' AM CI DANG, LHO 'PHYE CHEN PO DANG, ,MI DANG, MI MA YIN PA DE DAG THAMS CAD DANG, THAMS CAD DANG LDAN PA'I 'KHOR DE DAG DANG, LAG NA RDO RJE YANG BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA YI RANG STE MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA STOBS CHE BO ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO RDZOGS SO, ,DAG , ,,)
